CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7210SAS-MXP',"Please select the conformal coated variant if the SAS-MXP is to be installed in an environment where there could be increased moisture or dust.","ETR Conformal Coated Information")
CustomField.label: ETR Conformal Coated Information
